entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:43PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Sag River Causing Erosion Along the Dalton Highway... The Sagavanirktok River is currently flowing out of it`s bank and causing erosion along the Dalton Highway near milepost 403. entry.title: Flood Watch issued June 08 at 1:32AM MDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: .Scattered thunderstorms are possible over the area this afternoon, continuing into late tonight. These storms will form in a very moist airmass and move slowly, resulting in locally very heavy rainfall. Given the saturated soils from recent rainfall, any precipitation will run off quickly resulting in high potential for flash flooding near any thunderstorms.

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 11:58AM MDT until June 11 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The National Weather Service in Riverton continues the Flood Advisory for the following river in Wyoming... Little Wind River near Riverton affecting Fremont County. .Afternoon and evening showers and thunderstorms combined with high-elevation snowmelt due to warmer temperatures is keeping river levels elevated on the Little Wind River near Riverton.
